text: @NYGovCuomo Not on Staten  Island. Everyone  is  out to run their regular errands.  Most of them don't  even wear masks.  American  people  are not taking Coronavirus  seriously. That's  the reason death toll are going up each day. Thanks to Trump, the role model.
